title: Revenant
description: Louisiana. 1850.In the bayou, something that should be dead arises animated by a single thought: Revenge.Across the swamplands, a drum summons it into a terrible night of murder and lost memories.Voodoo tradition mixes with European legends in this cinematic tale from the author of ‘The South Will Rise Again’ and ‘Dead Men Tell No Tales’.
author: Jeffrey Kosh
